snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, acting on an idea he proposed in his inaugural address, is temporarily reassigning top deputies to other agencies in an effort to generate fresh ideas.

headline.main: Top Deputies Trading Places at City Hall
headline.print_headline: Top Deputies Trading Places At City Hall

snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, acting on an idea he proposed in his inaugural address, is temporarily reassigning top deputies at various agencies to other agencies in an effort to generate fresh ideas.
abstract: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, acting on an idea he proposed in his inaugural address, is temporarily reassigning top deputies at various agencies to other agencies in an effort to generate fresh ideas.

headline.main: City Hall to Start Shuffling Top Deputies

snippet: The decision to remove the movie from 2-D screens in China also had to do with the coming Chinese New Year holiday, when the state likes its citizens to see home-grown films.
abstract: The decision to remove the movie from 2-D screens in China also had to do with the coming Chinese New Year holiday, when the state likes its citizens to see home-grown films.

snippet: Take one splatter-painted invitation. Add a news blackout. Enter reality-distortion field. The result? More hype about a mystery product. Genius.
